text: Horacio Zeballos was the defending champion, but he did not participate this year. Íñigo Cervantes won the title defeating Nils Langer in the final, 2–6, 7–6(7–3), 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw ==References== Marburg Open - Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 Marburg Open – Singles
